job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongAssociate Technology and Innovation ATI is a Customer Service organization enabling Amazon to become Earths most customercentric company by efficiently building services products and programs that deliver exceptional customer and employee experiences anywhere at scale As a Data Scientist on the ATI Science team you will have the opportunity to build and deploy game changing data science and machine learning solutions that deliver exceptional Associate experiencesbrbrbrstronguBasic Qualificationsbrustrongulli Bachelors degree in Statistics Applied Math Operations Research Economics Engineering or a related quantitative field with three years of working experience as a Data Scientistlili Experience in SQL R Python or another scripting languagelili Track record of diving into data to discover hidden patterns and of conducting errordeviation analysislili Knowledge of various machine learning techniques and key parameters that affect their performancelili Excellent written and verbal communication skills for both technical and nontechnical audienceslili Strong troubleshooting and problemsolving skillslili Extensive knowledge and practical experience in one or more of the following areas machine learning statistics NLP deep learningbrliulstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongulli Masters degree in Statistics Applied Math Operations Research Economics Engineering or a related quantitative fieldlili 5 years of experience in data sciencebrbrliulstrongCompanystrong  Amazoncom Services LLCbrJob ID A1603329
